The pod sliently broke through the atmosphere. After a few minutes, 
the pod slamed into the earth. The probe scaned the area for a 
lifeform and chose. Moments passes till the pod door opened and a  
matllack black tiger stepped out into the open. "Night shade, 
terrorise." She transformed quickly and smirked. A new pred was born
